mint.mvc.core

类 ActionContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • mint.mvc.core.ActionContext

  • public final class ActionContext
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds all Servlet objects in ThreadLocal.
    作者:
    Michael Liao (askxuefeng@gmail.com), liangwei

    • 构造器概要

      构造器 
      构造器和说明
      ActionContext() 

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static ActionContext getActionContext()
      Get current ActionContext object.
      javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest getHttpServletRequest()
      Return current request object.
      javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse getHttpServletResponse()
      Return current response object.
      javax.servlet.http.HttpSession getHttpSession()
      Return current session object.
      javax.servlet.ServletContext getServletContext()
      Return the ServletContext of current web application.
